fg_segments: \ r \ r \ r \ r Bento.com (Tokyo Food Page) \ r has created this privacy \ r statement in order to demonstrate our firm commitment to privacy. \ r The following discloses the information gathering and \ r dissemination practices for this Web site: \ r \ r \ r Bento.com / Tokyo Food Page / Kansai Food Page \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Cookies \ r \ r \ r Our Site uses cookies to keep track of session information during restaurant search operations. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Advertisers \ r \ r \ r \ r We use outside ad agencies to display ads on our site.

These ads may contain cookies. \ r While we use cookies in other parts of our Web site, cookies received with banner ads are \ r collected by our ad company, and we do not have access to this information. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Some customer data may be shared with advertising companies via voluntary demographic surveys. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Personal Information \ r \ r \ r \ r This Web site does not request any personal information or collect any information that personally \ r identifies you or allows you to be personally contacted. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Since we do not collect any personal information on this Web site, we do not share any personal \ r information with any third parties nor do we use any personal information for any purposes. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r External Links \ r \ r \ r \ r This site contains links to other sites. \ r \ r Bento.com \ r \ r is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such Web sites. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Public Forums \ r \ r \ r This site makes message boards available to its users.

Please remember that any information that is disclosed in these areas becomes public information and you should exercise caution when deciding to disclose your personal information. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r Contacting the Web Site \ r \ r \ r \ r If you have any questions about this privacy statement, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this Web site, please \ r \ r \ r contact us. \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r \ r

raw_html:
Bento.com (Tokyo Food Page)
 has created this privacy
      statement in order to demonstrate our firm commitment to privacy.
      The following discloses the information gathering and
      dissemination practices for this Web site:
      

Bento.com / Tokyo Food Page / Kansai Food Page





Cookies


Our Site uses cookies to keep track of session information during restaurant search operations. 





Advertisers



        We use outside ad agencies to display ads on our site. These ads may contain cookies. 
        While we use cookies in other parts of our Web site, cookies received with banner ads are 
        collected by our ad company, and we do not have access to this information.
      



  
        Some customer data may be shared with advertising companies via voluntary demographic surveys.
      






Personal Information



        This Web site does not request any personal information or collect any information that personally 
        identifies you or allows you to be personally contacted.  
      



        Since we do not collect any personal information on this Web site, we do not share any personal 
        information with any third parties nor do we use any personal information for any purposes.
      





External Links



        This site contains links to other sites. 
        
Bento.com
 
       is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such Web sites. 
      





Public Forums


This site makes message boards available to its users. Please remember that any information that is disclosed in these areas becomes public information and you should exercise caution when deciding to disclose your personal information.





Contacting the Web Site



      If you have any questions about this privacy statement, the practices of this site, or your dealings with this Web site, please 
      

contact us.
